active_incidents.title: Issues with user status, read state, and file previews

notes.body: We’re looking into reports of user status not updating, users being unable to remove previews, and marking channels as read. We’ll let you know as we learn more. Thank you for bearing with us in the meantime.

active_incidents.title: Some users may be experiencing issues with Huddles.

notes.body:
We're continuing to work towards a fix, and will provide updates here when new information becomes available. 

We appreciate your patience in the meantime.

Some users may be experiencing trouble with huddles. 

We’re investigating and will let you know as soon as we know more. We appreciate your patience in the meantime.
